text.p: SW5e is a user created (Home-brew) set of Races, Classes, NPCs, etc. that works within the 5e ruleset.
This module contains the Tech Powers for SW5e. Tech Powers are treated as spells within the Fantasy Grounds interface to retain compatibility with the 5e ruleset.

p.b: If you find any errors or have suggestions on improvement please enter a ticket at the github site for this project.

text.p: Enjoy!
Special thanks to rob2e for the inspiration to make this module. I have emulated his style of using spell effects with permission. See link to rob2e below.
To download the latest SW5e PDF documentation see the first post in the SW5e subreddit below.
And, thanks to lordcygnus for his assistance in updating the modules with SW5e updates and changes. Seriously, it's like nailing down slime.
